en.name: PEGATRON
content: **2. Back-End:** Vue + Vuex + Vuetify, Import TinyMCE plugin
**3. Server:** Developed RESTful APIs using C# and .NET Core

zh.name: PEGATRON
content: **1. 後台：** Vue + Vuex + Vuetify，引用 TinyMCE 套件
**1. 後端：** C# .NET Core 開發 RESTful API

en.name: 2018 referendum : Scatterplot matrix
content:
**Shiny App:**
 Used the ggpairs function from the GGally package to explore referendum outcomes and social characteristics across different groups (counties/cities).

zh.name: 2018年公投 : 成對變數矩陣
content:
**Shiny App:**
 以 GGally 套件的 ggpairs 函數，觀察不同分群(縣市)下的公投狀況以及社會特性表現。

en.name: 2018 referendum : PCA analysis
content:
**Shiny App:**
 Integrated with GIS maps to select data points sharing similar dimensions under PCA and observe their geographical distribution.

zh.name: 2018年公投 : PCA 分析
content:
**Shiny App:**
 搭配GIS地圖，可以圈選PCA下相同維度的資料點，並觀察地理分佈。
